title: Thick As a Brick 40th Anniversary Special Edition update
description:
This is a fix for the two disc 40th Anniversary Special Edition of the Jethro Tull album Thick As a Brick.

This torrent contains the files that were updated for the second print of the DVD.

Only the 5.1 surround tracks were replaced as only they were affected by the audio glitches. The DVD stereo tracks and the audio CD are 
identical in both issues.

-------------------------------

You can tell if you have a good or a bad disc by looking at the DVD label or by listening to it.

Bad DVD:
No line underscoring the text on the DVD label (see the included images).
Audio glitches at 2:33, 2:49 and 3:03 on the DTS and Dolby surround tracks.
The track is silent after Ian has sung the final Ã¢â‚¬Å“thick as a brickÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ at the end of the album.

Good DVD:
Line underscoring the text on the label.
No audio glitches at the mentioned times.
Three seconds after the final Ã¢â‚¬Å“thick as a brickÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Ian quietly mutters Ã¢â‚¬Å“YeahÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ before the track ends.

-------------------------------

Background

When this special edition was released it was infamously affected by audio glitches which warranted a reprint. It had also gone through a 
heavy-handed mastering which made particularly the cymbals directly painful to hear at higher volumes. In my opinion the undoing of the 
mastering is prime reason why you should get this update.

The reprint corrected those problems, but unfortunately not all buyers had their discs replaced and shipped copies were not recalled. With no 
way of telling if a case contains a good or bad DVD finding a good one still proves to be pretty much a search in the dark, which is why I 
decided to upload this.

If Warner Music ever makes it possible for fans to acquire the fixed disc I will remove this torrent
